WorkItem.Description:
Zooming do not work while over item with context menu (see: context menu sample).
 
Sample downloaded: https://skydrive.live.com/?cid=eaf0a921258b5980&sc=documents&id=EAF0A921258B5980%212685
 
Zooming is centered on mouse usually but zooming stop working while over an object.
